Package seng201.team53.gui.controller

Class MapInteractionController

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.gui.controller.MapInteractionController
public class MapInteractionController extends Object
This class is a sub-controller of the GameController and is responsible for handling map interactions

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MapInteractionController(GameController gameController)
    Constructs a new map interaction controller with a reference to the main game controller

    • tryMoveTower

      public void tryMoveTower(Tile tile)
      Start the process of moving the tower on this tile (if there is one). Will remove the tower from the map, and the user wil begin placing it again.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile the user clicked, that may contain a tower.
